评论概述: Fits Well, great fabric, but Sleeves are Snug
评论详情: This dress is lightweight and has very sturdy fabric. All the buttons on the top to the waist are functional and the last 5 buttons are also. This gives you the chance to have a deeper neckline, ability to breastfeed/pump for mama's, and to make the slit in the dress more pronounced.  I did find that the sleeves are a little snug if you have beefy arms. I usually go up one size in most dresses for length and more of a loose fit. I'm glad I got the bigger size. I fear my true to size would have been too snug in the sleeves. In my one up size, the sleeves are fitted but not so snug that I can't wrap my arms into a hug. Please Note: the sleeves DO NOT stretch. The only part where this dress has stretch is in the waist line to accentuate curves in a flattering fit.  I will recommend this pretty dress to others and simply advise potential buyers to be mindful of their arm sizes. My arms measure about 15in loosely. Again, I have beefy upper arms. I went with the 2x instead of 1x or XL.

I bought the green one and it has butterflies on it. In my opinion, the butterflies make it look cheap. This dress is made like the cheapest fabric was rolled off the fabric roll and thrown together. It looks like curtains that don’t block light. It feels like your grandma’s old table cloth. The buttons don’t line up and there are kinks everywhere. The drawstring serves no purpose. I’ve bought many dresses and this receives award for worst one. Thanks for reading

I was at a wedding as a musician because, previously, the bride asked if I could wear a floral dress and this was my choice and when it was breezy, my skirt became very flowing and I loved it. I hope I get more use out of this dress.

This dress fits well and is comfortable. I wore it to my neighbor’s 90th birthday and then put a pretty pink sweater over it and wore it to a movie screening. It’s versatile and very pretty. I’m 5’ 10” tall and hits me about mid calf, which I like. You can dress it up with a pretty sandal or dress it down with white Ked’s.  Three cons: 1) The underskirt/slip needs to be longer and is sewed in a little bit wonky. 2) The elastic, shirred waist needs to wider. 3) I have another dress, same style and brand but different fabric, that I bought several years ago. It is better made with more attention to little details. I can tell the company is taking shortcuts.

Ordered a large.  I typically wear a 12.  I am 5'1"ish, 157 lbs.  The top fit perfectly, however, it was too big in waist and hips.  A wide belt did not help.  The length was perfect.  The material soooo comfortable.  A smaller size would pull across the chest.  (I am a 38 B/C).  I may try a medium just to see if that is the case.  Don't hesitate to try this dress...  It just didn't work on my funky figure.

I ordered this dress because I was having surgery and needed something that didn’t rest on my abdomen and buttoned up. This dress buttons at the top and bottom, but the middle area at the stretchy part is mock buttons. That was okay, since it still doesn’t rest against my abdomen. Every time I wear this dress I get compliments! It’s super comfortable too. I initially ordered one in black and another in pink, but just ordered 4 more in other colors.  Sizing seems true to size. I’m about 5’7 180lbs and a large is plenty big enough. I almost ordered xtra large bc of the reviews, but so far, large fits well. They do wrinkle easily. There’s extra fabric behind the buttons and a slip area by the hips to make sure people don’t see anything they aren’t supposed to. I recommend this as a cute and comfortable dress!
